## IDraggableTrait interface

An entity that may handle hover events. Unlike other interaction traits, if a redraw is required this must be done through the plot wide interaction handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDraggableTrait extends IHitTestableTrait 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IHitTestableTrait](./core.ihittestabletrait.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onDragEnd(pointerEvent, segmentIds)?](./core.idraggabletrait.ondragend.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [onDragStart(pointerEvent, segmentIds)?](./core.idraggabletrait.ondragstart.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Return <code>true</code> to indicate that the entity may be dragged. |
